full_description:
RECCI RPB-P35 Mars Series 10000 mAh 22.5W Fast Charging Power Bank

The RECCI RPB-P35 Mars Series is a powerful and reliable power bank that can charge your devices quickly and safely. It has a capacity of 10,000 mAh and can support fast charging and super fast charging with its USB and PD ports. It offers an input port of Type C and output ports of Type C and USB. RECCI RPB-P35 Mars Series 10000 mAh 22.5W Fast Charging Power Bank can deliver different power levels depending on the device's needs. The RECCI RPB-P35 Mars Series has a light and small design that makes it easy to transport. RECCI RPB-P35 has a size of 125x205x47mm and weighs only 200g. You can take it anywhere and use it for various devices, such as smartphones, tablets, laptops, etc. The RECCI RPB-P35 Mars Series 10000 mAh 22.5W Fast Charging Power Bank offers powerful performance, reliable safety and fast charging capability at an affordable price.

Buy RECCI RPB-P35 Mars Series 10000 mAh 22.5W Fast Charging Power Bank from Star Tech

In Bangladesh, you can get original RECCI RPB-P35 Mars Series 10000 mAh 22.5W Fast Charging Power Bank From Star Tech. We have a large collection of latest RECCI Power Bank to purchase. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at lowest price. The RECCI RPB-P35 Mars Series 10000 mAh 22.5W Fast Charging Power Bank comes with no warranty.
